roleset.name: make lanes out of a certain area or space
roleset.note: LANE-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from lane.01-v)

role.descr: area made into/made to be surrounded by lanes

example.name: With number of lanes as extent
example.src: With number of lanes as extent
example.type: With number of lanes as extent
example.text: Dale Totten , resident engineer for the Virginia Department of Transportation , noted that VDOT would four - lane the road for about $ 13 million *U* if it had more money .
